list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a thing constituting a piece of evidence about the past, especially an account kept in writing or some other permanent form.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: you should keep a written record
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bạn nên giữ một bản ghi bằng văn bản

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the sum of the past achievements or actions of a person or organization; a person or thing's previous conduct or performance.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the safety record at the airport
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Hồ sơ an toàn tại sân bay

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (especially in sports) the best performance or most remarkable event of its kind that has been officially measured and noted.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he held the world record for over a decade
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ông giữ kỷ lục thế giới trong hơn một thập kỷ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a thin plastic disk carrying recorded sound, especially music, in grooves on each surface, for reproduction by a record player.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I'm listening to records in my room
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đang nghe những bản ghi trong phòng của tôi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: set down in writing or some other permanent form for later reference, especially officially.
convert (sound or a performance) into permanent form for later reproduction.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they were recording a guitar recital
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: họ đang ghi lại một bản nhạc guitar
